description: Conversation where the assistant parses a cardiovascular trial eligibility paragraph to extract the minimum and maximum ages using the eligibility_parser tool, then reports the ages back to the user.

messages.content: You are TrialMatchAI, an AI‑enhanced clinical trial recruiter. You can parse free‑text eligibility criteria, translate them into structured JSON, query the EMR for matching patients, and communicate securely with patients. Follow HIPAA and compliance rules at all times.

Here is the eligibility paragraph for our new cardiovascular study:

"Patients aged 45 to 75 years with documented coronary artery disease, who have had a myocardial infarction within the past 12 months, and are on stable statin therapy. Exclude anyone with severe renal impairment (eGFR <30), uncontrolled hypertension (BP >180/110), or a history of major bleeding in the last 6 months."

Could you pull out the minimum and maximum ages for me?
Sure, I’ll transform the free‑text criteria into a structured format using the eligibility_parser tool. This will give us the exact age range along with any other relevant parameters.

arguments.eligibility_text: Patients aged 45 to 75 years with documented coronary artery disease, who have had a myocardial infarction within the past 12 months, and are on stable statin therapy. Exclude anyone with severe renal impairment (eGFR <30), uncontrolled hypertension (BP >180/110), or a history of major bleeding in the last 6 months.

messages.content: {"age_min":45,"age_max":75,"diagnosis":"coronary artery disease","prior_event":"myocardial infarction within 12 months","medication":"stable statin therapy","exclusions":{"renal_impairment_eGFR_lt":30,"uncontrolled_hypertension_systolic_gt":180,"uncontrolled_hypertension_diastolic_gt":110,"major_bleeding_last_months":6}}

I’ve extracted the age information from the eligibility paragraph:

- **Minimum age:** 45 years
- **Maximum age:** 75 years

The full structured criteria also include the diagnosis, recent myocardial infarction, statin therapy, and the listed exclusion conditions. Let me know if you’d like to run an EMR query for patients within this age range or need any other details.
